version_description:
Thanks for using TBC Bank app! Here’s what you’ll find in our latest update:
· P2P transfers - Now you can transfer money by just entering receiver’s mobile number.
· Other minor bug fixes and performance improvements made.

In case you missed our previous update, here are the goodies wrapped up in TBC Bank 2.2.0:
· Now you can set skins to give the app unique look. If you are VIP or Status customer you can additionally choose from VIP and Status skins.
· You can get directions to TBC Bank’s preferred ATMs and branches.
· Blocked amount page added to let you get more info for each card transaction.

Thanks for using TBC Bank app! Here’s what you’ll find in our latest update:
· Touch ID login – now you can login using just your fingerprint
· Transfers and mobile top up can be done without creating templates
· You can now edit mobile top up templates
· You can share and copy your account number from product details page
· Accounts with inactive cards are now displayed on products page
· Guest login – now you can let others access their accounts without resetting your passcode
· App is now optimized for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+
· Minor bugs fixed

In case you missed our previous update, here are the goodies wrapped up in TBC Bank 2.4.0:
· P2P transfers - now you can transfer money by just entering receiver’s mobile number.

Thanks for using TBC Bank app!
· iOS9 compatibility improvements made

Thanks for using TBC Bank app!
· Problem with pasting digipass code solved

Thanks for using TBC Bank app! Here’s what you’ll find in our latest update:
· Touch ID icon added on login page to make login process easier
· Direct transfers with mobile number (P2P) can be done without templates
· Multiple bill payment lets you pay several bills at once
· Currency widget – just slide down your widget bar and add TBC widget to check latest currency exchange rates without login
· Delete entered amount when you shake your phone
· Update tour for every important update of our app
· Password recovery function for forgotten credentials
· Minor bugs fixed


In case you missed our previous update, here are the goodies wrapped up in TBC Bank 2.5.0:
· Touch ID login – Now you can login using only your fingerprint
· Transfer and mobile top up can be done without templates
· App is now optimized for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+ screens
· You can share and copy your account number from product details page
· Guest login – for entering mobile bank using different accounts without resetting existing easy login
· You can now edit number and name of existing mobile top up template
· Inactive cards are now displayed in products page.
· New design for adding payments and templates to the lists.

Thanks for using TBC Bank app! Here’s what you’ll find in our latest update:
· Get preapproved loans instantly from your phone
· Increase limit on credit cards with preapproved amount
· Now you can see detailed distribution of loan prepayment amount
· Minor bugs fixed


In case you missed our previous update, here are the goodies wrapped up in TBC Bank 2.6.0:
· Touch ID icon added on login page to make login process easier
· Direct transfers with mobile number (P2P) can be done without templates
· Multiple bill payment lets you pay several bills at once
· Currency widget – just slide down your widget bar and add TBC widget to check latest currency exchange rates without login
· Delete entered amount when you shake your phone
· Update tour for every important update of our app
· Password recovery function for forgotten credentials
· Minor bugs fixed

Thanks for using TBC Bank app!
In the latest update we’ve fixed some problems with Pre-approved Loans

In case you missed our previous update, here are the goodies wrapped up in TBC Bank 2.7.7 and 2.7.8:
• Compatibility issue for users with older iOS versions
• Exchange rates page will display special rate for mobile banking users;
• Beneficiary name will be automatically filled in when you enter account number of TBC Bank customer in external transfers page;
• Now you can see the most popular templates using 3D touch technology by harder click on the application icon
• Minor bugs fixed;

We’ve been working hard on the new update and here’s what we have for you:
· Now clients can register directly from the application
· You can now recover your password with any of your TBC plastic cards
· Status and VIP clients can see personal banker info on the homepage
· Smart search is added in transactions history page
· You can “long press” on any product on home page to get “I’d like to” option
· When the app is minimized the information is blurred to better protect your privacy
· New icons have been added to transaction categories

Since we couldn’t find major bugs, we fixed all the minor bugs we could detect!

We’re back again with some new features to make you happy, here’s what we have for you:
· Now you can Block or Unblock cards
· You can also open “My Safe” Deposit instantly
· Status and VIP clients can use Viber to contact their personal banker using Video or standard chat
· Now clients registered at branch can login directly to mobile banking without the need to first login to Internet Banking

Since we couldn’t find major bugs, we fixed all the minor bugs we could detect!

We have some new features, hope you’ll like them
- New loyalty program Ertguli replaced the Smart Club
- Credit card “Ertguli” users will enjoy new functions and design
- You can open “My Goal” deposit and activate standing order
- “Transaction History” has now updated search bar
- Personal Banker users have now Concierge and Statusdonates services
Want to see your discovered bug or new feature idea in this list? We would too. Send the message with your feedback to us

- Credit card “Ertguli” users will enjoy new functions and design

Hi there, we have some new features and improvements, hope you’ll like them

- If you want to be even more secured, from now on you can set two-factor authentication
- We have some changes in UI for the Login and Dashboard pages
- You will also enjoy redesigned and easier bill payment flow
- While sending a message to TBC Bank you will be able to attach files
- Our application now offers optimized battery consumption

Want to see your discovered bug or new feature idea in this list? We would too. Send the message with your feedback to us.

- Our application now offers optimized battery consumption

Want to see your discovered bug or new feature idea in this list? We would too. Send the message with your feedback to us. :)

New features and improvements, that would bring better experience for you while using our app

- Now you can directly buy mobile packages
- If you love traveling, you can buy travel insurance for you or for someone else
- Enjoy redesigned, more user friendly offers page
- Now Our application consumes less traffic and has become even faster

Want to see your discovered bug or new feature idea in this list? We would too. Send the message with your feedback to us.

- Now our app is compatible with iPhone X
- Small improvements in application design

Want to see your discovered bug or new feature idea in this list? We would too. Send the message with your feedback to us.

- Now our app is compatible with iPhone X

Want to see your discovered bug or new feature idea in this list? We would too. Send the message with your feedback to us.

We're back again with good news to improve your experience with TBC Bank

- Enjoy automatic transfers, create and control payment orders right from mobile bank
- Enjoy redesigned, more user friendly offers page
- View redesigned setting page
- Use updated car fines flow
- Feel improvements and minor bug fixes

Enjoy UI and UX updates feel free to send the message with your feedback about bugs or good ideas.
Always happy to fix some bugs and make our experience better.

We're back again with good news to improve your experience with TBC Bank :-)
- Open Money Box and save your money
- Renew your Ertguli card
- Use more secured passwords and feel safe
- Search desired template and transfer money
Enjoy UI and UX updates. Feel free to send the message with your feedback about bugs or good ideas.

We're back again with good news to improve your experience with TBC Bank :-)
- Repeat transaction, pay back, share receipt, save template and set automatic transfers directly from transaction details
- Hide or show desired accounts on dashboard
Enjoy UI and UX updates feel free to send the message with your feedback about bugs or good ideas.

We have fixed several invisible bugs.
If you have a new feature idea or discover well hidden bug, send the message with your feedback to us :-)

We're back again with good news to improve your experience with TBC Bank :-)
- Enjoy renewed chart of “Your Expenses” on dashboard
- Add your car, check car fines, parking permit, and make easy payment in few seconds
Enjoy UI and UX updates, feel free to send the message with your feedback about bugs or good ideas.

We're back again with good news to improve your experience with TBC Bank :-)
- Use your frequently used templates from header and pay even faster
Enjoy UI and UX updates, feel free to send the message with your feedback about bugs or good ideas.

We're back again with good news to improve your experience with TBC Bank :-)
- We have fixed several invisible bugs and improved some process flows
- iOS 12 is now fully supported
- and also enjoy UI/UX improvements
Feel free to send the message with your feedback about bugs or good ideas.

We are back with some exciting news!

> Transfer money via voice commands!
> Buy auto insurance by a simple click on your offers.
> Discover visible and invisible improvements :)

and of course feel free to share your ideas with us about improving the application! <3

Great news for our app users!

• We have freshened up application with brand new sounds.
• We have also fixed some bugs (both visible and invisible ones :) )
• UI/UX has been slightly improved in this version

Finally feel free to message us and share your feedback about bugs or some fancy ideas.

We're back again with good news to improve your experience with TBC Bank :-)
- We have fixed several invisible bugs and improved some process flows
- iOS 12 is now fully supported
- and also enjoy UI/UX improvements
Feel free to send the message with your feedback about bugs or good ideas.

Great news for our app users!

• We will give you more insights about your spending habits by showing you your last month’s summary of how much did you spend, for what purposes and etc.
• We have also fixed some bugs (both visible and invisible ones) :-)
• UI/UX has been slightly improved in this version

And finally feel free to message us and share your feedback about bugs or some fancy ideas.

> Transfer money via voice commands!
> Buy auto insurance by a simple click on your offers.
> Discover visible and invisible improvements :)

and of course feel free to share your ideas with us about improving the application! <3

Hey we've got some news for you ^_^

*You can now turn on/off sounds from application settings.
*Great news for parents! Kid's card will be displayed in your account list.
*Copy account number >> open our app >> enjoy magic.
*There are lots of other visible/invisible improvements coming in new version.

As always feel free to report bugs or any kind of improvements <3

Hey we've got some news for you ^_^

*You can now turn on/off sounds from application settings.
*Great news for parents! Kid's card will be displayed in your account list.
*Copy account number >> open our app >> enjoy magic.
*There are lots of other visible/invisible improvements coming in new version.

As always feel free to report bugs or any kind of improvements <3

We’re back with some news for you!

*You can now filter your transaction history with amounts
* You can activate payment protection insurance from offers page
*We made security optimization
*There’re also some invisible improvements in app ^_^

As always feel free to report any bugs or ideas for improvement < 3

We’re back with some news for you!
*You can now filter your transaction history with amounts
* You can activate payment protection insurance from offers page
*We made security optimization
*There’re also some invisible improvements in app ^_^

As always feel free to report any bugs or ideas for improvement < 3

We are back with big news ^ ^
· You can enjoy card free payments at merchants via QR payments right from your dashboard
· You also can become status digital member by activating it from your offers page
· And of course we fixed some bugs

Waiting for your recommendations and comments <3

Back again with good news
Activate trusted devices from Settings and transfer money without SMS/Digipass verification. We have also fixed some invisible bugs.
Looking forward to new ideas and your feedback <3
Hi there, we are  back with some bug fixes ^^
Hi all, we are back with some improvements and bug fixes
Hi all, we are back with some improvements and bug fixes

Hi there ^^
We are back with big news!
We updated look & feel of our app:
· Enjoy fresh design of whole app
· Set updated dark mode from settings
· Manage your products in easier way from my products page

Hi all,
We are back with updated look & feel of whole app and some bug fixes <3
- You can set updated dark mode from settings
- Explore quick actions on my products page
- In order to use Touch ID or Face ID setting pass code is required

Hello, we are back again with good news ^^
-Now you can see your pension savings on dashboard
-Check new offers created personally for you
-We have also fixed small bugs
Looking forward to your feedback and new ideas <3

Hi there, enjoy some great news in our app:
- Hide or show total available amount on your dashboard
- Add your cards to Apple Wallet right from my products page
- Use QR for ATM withdrawal
Share with us your feedback and ideas < 3

Hi there, enjoy some great news in our app:
- Hide or show total available amount on your dashboard
- Add your cards to Apple Wallet right from my products page
- Use QR for ATM withdrawal
Share with us your feedback and ideas < 3

We are back again with good news:
-Now you can transfer money within TBC bank by using personal ID
-We also fixed some minor bugs
Share with us your feedback and ideas <3

We are back with great news ^^
Digital card has been added to debit card offers. You can instantly activate it and start using.
As next we will enable this card to be added into e-commerce platforms.
As always feel free to give us your recommendations <3

Hi there, we are back with some great news ^^
- Now you can receive money transfers from payments page.
- We also made some UX improvements on manage accounts page.
- Your Monthly expenses pie chart on homepage is now customizable, select your preferred date and view your expenses from chosen date.

Don’t forget to give us your feedback and recommendations :)

We have some news for you ^^
- You can now look through the applications history and agreements on My Applications page
- In case you need a loan, you’ll be able to request it and sign the agreement fully online with Mobilebanking
Thanks for being with us and feedback will be appreciated :)

Hi there ^^
We’re back with great news!
- You can enjoy mobilebanking without using your internet data;
- Finally you can group your bills and monitor them more easily;
- If you are a car owner, now you can activate car insurance from parking and fines page.
Feel free to return to us with your feedback

Hi there ^^
Great news!
Discover our new visual style - Concept if you are a Status customer.
Feel free to return to us with your feedback

Hi!
We are back with some improvements and bugfixes
Feel free to give us your feedback and recommendations ^^

Hey there!
Here we are with some UX improvements and fixes that will make your journey in the app even easier ^^
We are happy to receive your recommendations and feedback ^^

-Look through and order the Bank subscription plan from Offers page
We are happy to receive your recommendations and feedback ^^

Hi there, we’re back with some news ^^
- Additional security methods are being added to the Mobilebank, so you will need to enter SMS or Digipass code in addition to log in to the app
- You can mark your device as trusted so will be able to log in without SMS or Digipass code
- Now you can make the receiver’s template as trusted and transfer money without entering SMS or Digipass code
We are happy to receive your recommendations and feedback

You can now use renewed Transactions history with a smart filter. We made it even easier to find the desired transactions in a very simple way within one click^^
